name: The Sands
description:
You have died... As a punishment for your actions during your life, you have been sentenced to find your own way to hell trough.. the sands.

Controlls Movement W, A, S, D and arrow keys. Take Crystals Left Click Friday Night Game Jam

This game was made for a game jam, where you have to make a game in 3 hours. The 3-hours contain the actual development, but not the planning. 

All of the assets were made during the time of the jam by me.
